description.original: Folder with the capability to store and retrieve data from a folder like database
description.translation: 在“文件”菜单中显示“在系统资源管理器中显示”

dict.title:\"Particular properties of {0} col: title:" {0} 列类型的特殊属性"
dict.setName(\"Select where to save your data: setName("选择要保存数据库的位置"
dict.desc:\"Unique ID of the column. Key used: desc:"列的唯一ID。保存时使用的键(支持使用'.'嵌套)也在公式和汇总中引用"
dict.desc:\"Convert field to inline (field::: desc:"将字段转换为内联(字段：：VALUE)或将其保留为首页(-字段：VALUE-)"
dict.desc:\"Change content alignment of the c: desc:"更改列的内容对齐方式"
dict.desc:\"Change content vertical alignment: desc:"更改列内容的垂直对齐方式"
dict.desc:\"Enable/disable to wrap content of: desc:"启用/禁用换行该列的内容"
dict.desc:\"Enable/disable alias for media li: desc:"使用列标签启用/禁用媒体链接的别名"
dict.desc:\"Custom alias for media links (lea: desc:"媒体链接的自定义别名(留空以使用列标签)"
dict.desc:\"Enable/disable wrap media links w: desc:"启用/禁用包含嵌入内容的换行媒体链接"
dict.desc:\"Choose dimensions of embeded medi: desc:"选择嵌入媒体的尺寸（高，宽）"
dict.desc:\"Select from which source you want: desc:"选择要在表中显示的数据来源."
dict.section:\"Configuration about folder str: section:"关于文件夹结构的配置"
dict.desc:\"Choose how compact or wide cells: desc:"选择单元格的紧凑程度和宽度."
dict.desc:\"Whether to make the first column: desc:"是否将第一列设置为冻结状态，以便在水平滚动时保持可见."
dict.desc:\"The folder structure will mirror: desc:"文件夹结构将反映这些列的值"
dict.title:\"Group all files into folders aut: title:"自动将所有文件分组到文件夹中"
dict.desc:\"By default, files are groupped in: desc:"默认情况下，在更新值之后，文件将单独分组"
dict.desc:\"Automatically remove empty folder: desc:"对文件分组后自动删除空文件夹."
dict.title:\"Hoist files with missing attribu: title:"将缺少属性的文件挂起到根文件夹"
dict.desc:\"By default, files with missing at: desc:"默认情况下，缺少属性的文件会被挂起到尽可能低的文件夹"
dict.desc:\"Enable/disable remove fields when: desc:"启用/禁用删除列时的删除字段"
dict.desc:\"Select file to use as template fo: desc:"选择要用作数据库列模板的文件。单击该按钮以应用模板."
dict.desc:\"Use all fields from all your note: desc:"使用所有备注中的所有字段作为列。警告！这将覆盖以前的所有列"
dict.desc:\"New columns will be created as in: desc:"默认情况下，新列将创建为行内字段"
dict.title:\"Folder to read the templates\": title:"用于读取模板的文件夹"
dict.desc:\"Select folder to read the availab: desc:"选择文件夹以读取数据库的可用模板"
dict.desc:\"Use the slider to select the size: desc:"使用滑块来选择字体的大小（以像素为单位）"
dict.desc:\"Show/hide footer of the database\: desc:"显示/隐藏数据库的页脚"
dict.desc:\"The format of the datetime with L: desc:"符合LUXON标准的日期时间格式"
dict.section:\"Automations related to the tab: section:"与该表相关的自动化操作"
dict.desc:\"Select the destination of the for: desc:"选择公式JS文件的目标位置."
dict.title:\"Select another table to relate w: title:"选择另一个要与其关联的表"
dict.desc:\"Select from the existing tables t: desc:"从现有表中选择与当前列关联"
dict.desc:\"Add new pair label-value to the l: desc:"将新的配对标签-值添加到此列的可用选项列表中"
dict.desc:\"Enable/disable to persist formula: desc:"启用/禁用保留笔记上的公式输出（只有保留公式可以进行搜索和排序)"
dict.desc:\"Write your column formula using t: desc:"使用可用的函数+Java脚本编写列公式"
dict.text:\"Check our documentation for more: text:"有关如何使用公式的更多信息，请查看我们的文档"
dict.desc:\"Select the relation column to per: desc:"选择关系列以执行汇总"
dict.desc:\"Enable/disable Created Metadata C: desc:"启用/禁用创建日期的元数据列"
dict.desc:\"Enable/disable Modified Metadata: desc:"启用/禁用修改日期的元数据列"
dict.desc:\"Enable/disable File Tasks Column\: desc:"启用/禁用文件任务的元数据列"
dict.desc:\"Enable/disable File Inlinks Colum: desc:"启用/禁用文件入链的元数据列"
dict.desc:\"Enable/disable File Outlinks Colu: desc:"启用/禁用修文件出链的元数据列"
dict.desc:\"Enable/disable File Tags Column\": desc:"启用/禁用文件标签的元数据列"
dict.title:\"Select position of new inline fi: title:"选择新的行内字段的位置"
dict.desc:\"New inline fields will be created: desc:"新的行内字段将在笔记上的选定位置创建"
dict.title:\"Default media link state (on/off: title:"默认媒体链接状态(开/关)"
dict.desc:\"Default value of wrap media links: desc:"包含嵌入内容的换行媒体链接的默认值"
dict.title:\"Default link alias state (on/off: title:"默认链接别名状态(开/关)"
dict.desc:\"Use column label as link alias of: desc:"使用列标签作为URL的链接别名"
dict.desc:\"Choose default value of media dim: desc:"选择媒体尺寸的默认值(高、宽)"
dict.desc:\"This setting defines the mandator: desc:"此设置定义必须出现在 csv 文件中的强制头键"
dict.section:\"Helpers/Commands related to th: section:"与该表相关的辅助程序/命令"
dict.title:\"Show Search Bar By Default\": title:"默认情况下显示搜索栏"
dict.desc:\"The search bar will be shown by d: desc:"打开数据库时，默认情况下将显示搜索栏"
dict.desc:\"Enable auto update listener from: desc:"用来自其他文件的自动更新监听器。警告: 需要重新启动才能生效."
dict.section:\"Configuration about developer: section:"关于开发人员工具的配置"
dict.title:\"Enable developer settings. Logge: title:"启用开发人员设置。将启用日志记录器"
dict.desc:\"This will log all the errors and: desc:"这将记录控制台中的所有错误和警告"
dict.desc:\"This will show/hide properties of: desc:"这将在视图底部显示/隐藏表格的属性"
dict.If enabled, the relation will be bidirec: 如果启用，该关系将是双向的。如果禁用，则该关系将是单向的.
dict.desc:\"Select the action to perform on t: desc:"选择要在汇总上执行的操作"
dict.desc:\"Select the property to rollup fro: desc:"从关系中选择要汇总的属性"
dict.desc:\"Enable/disable to persist rollup: desc:"启用/禁用以将汇总输出保存在笔记上(只有已保存的汇总可以进行搜索和排序)"
